name: The Platform Of The Cars
description:
I am making this game for the  Godot wild Game jam #44 (Fragile).  The first thing I made for this project was the "ice" platforms. I had the idea because ice is fragile lol, it is also slippery and weak. I also made a bouncy platform ;)

So far I need to flesh out some more levels and then create some music and add sound fx. 

I customized the "3D Car with Settingspanel" from "OnSr" I found in the official Godot AssetLib.
